name: Press "L" "O" "V" "E"
description: This work is made with Unreal Engine. While viewers are playing the game, they can press “L” “O” “V” “E” keys to spawn the main character who are attached with soundtrack from Grave of the Fireflies. Viewers can also explore the game by teleporting to different locations to read poem and title sequences. And there is only one exit hidden in the game. In this work, I am visualizing what is like to be a lonely gamer who was fed up with the fantasies and tropes but was unable to find something truthful. It is a nightmare of feeling beaten up and tired. The only way to get out of this nightmare is to realize something truthful lies within instead of existing elsewhere. It requires a leap of faith to exit the loop of melancholy.
